data.name: Peter B. Parker
data.description: An amazing daddy-daughter duo, Peter B. Parker uses his experience to motivate his allies while baby Mayday unleashes pure infant chaos on her enemies!

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn, another <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and another <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>3</color> turns to the most injured <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally.
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to the <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally with the highest Damage.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
On Turn, prolong the duration of all positive effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on the most injured <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally, then apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to the highest Damage <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally is attacked, Heal the most injured <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally or self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade: When this character or any <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally is attacked, if the attacked character had <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, clear <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from this character and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies

When this character or any <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally is attacked:
 > Heal the most injured <color=#fff568>HERO SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally or self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > If the attacked character had <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, clear <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> from this character and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Assist Chance + <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies, this character and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
